<style id='generate-style-inline-css'>@media (max-width:768px){}
.entry-header{display:none}
.page-content, .entry-content, .entry-summary{margin-top:0}
body{background-color:#ffffff;color:#3a3a3a;}
a, a:visited{color:#1e73be;}
a:hover, a:focus, a:active{color:#000000;}
body .grid-container{max-width:1000px;}
body, button, input, select, textarea{font-family:-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol";}
.entry-content > [class*="wp-block-"]:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:1.5em;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul ul li a{font-size:14px;}
@media (max-width:768px){.main-title{font-size:30px;}h1{font-size:30px;}h2{font-size:25px;}}.top-bar{background-color:#636363;color:#ffffff;}
.top-bar a,.top-bar a:visited{color:#ffffff;}
.top-bar a:hover{color:#303030;}
.site-header{background-color:#ffffff;}
.site-header a,.site-header a:visited{color:#3a3a3a;}
.main-title a,.main-title a:hover,.main-title a:visited{color:#1c52a1;}
.site-description{color:#757575;}
.main-navigation,.main-navigation ul ul{background-color:#75c5c6;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul li a,.menu-toggle{color:#ffffff;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul li:hover > a,.main-navigation .main-nav ul li:focus > a, .main-navigation .main-nav ul li.sfHover > a{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1c52a1;}
button.menu-toggle:hover,button.menu-toggle:focus,.main-navigation .mobile-bar-items a,.main-navigation .mobile-bar-items a:hover,.main-navigation .mobile-bar-items a:focus{color:#ffffff;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul li[class*="current-menu-"] > a{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1c52a1;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul li[class*="current-menu-"] > a:hover,.main-navigation .main-nav ul li[class*="current-menu-"].sfHover > a{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1c52a1;}
.navigation-search input[type="search"],.navigation-search input[type="search"]:active{color:#1c52a1;background-color:#1c52a1;}
.navigation-search input[type="search"]:focus{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1c52a1;}
.main-navigation ul ul{background-color:#75c5c6;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul ul li a{color:#ffffff;}
.main-navigation .main-nav ul ul li:hover > a,.main-navigation .main-nav ul ul li:focus > a,.main-navigation .main-nav ul ul li.sfHover > a{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1c52a1;}

.separate-containers .inside-article, .separate-containers .comments-area, .separate-containers .page-header, .one-container .container, .separate-containers .paging-navigation, .inside-page-header{background-color:#ffffff;}
.entry-meta{color:#595959;}
.entry-meta a,.entry-meta a:visited{color:#595959;}
.entry-meta a:hover{color:#1e73be;}
.sidebar .widget{background-color:#ffffff;}
.sidebar .widget .widget-title{color:#000000;}
.footer-widgets{background-color:#ffffff;}
.footer-widgets .widget-title{color:#000000;}
.site-info{color:#ffffff;background-color:#75c5c6;}
.site-info a,.site-info a:visited{color:#ffffff;}
.site-info a:hover{color:#ffffff;}
.footer-bar .widget_nav_menu .current-menu-item a{color:#ffffff;}
input[type="text"],input[type="email"],input[type="url"],input[type="password"],input[type="search"],input[type="tel"],input[type="number"],textarea,select{color:#666666;background-color:#fafafa;border-color:#cccccc;}
input[type="text"]:focus,input[type="email"]:focus,input[type="url"]:focus,input[type="password"]:focus,input[type="search"]:focus,input[type="tel"]:focus,input[type="number"]:focus,textarea:focus,select:focus{color:#666666;background-color:#ffffff;border-color:#bfbfbf;}
button,html input[type="button"],input[type="reset"],input[type="submit"],a.button,a.button:visited,a.wp-block-button__link:not(.has-background){color:#ffffff;background-color:#666666;}
button:hover,html input[type="button"]:hover,input[type="reset"]:hover,input[type="submit"]:hover,a.button:hover,button:focus,html input[type="button"]:focus,input[type="reset"]:focus,input[type="submit"]:focus,a.button:focus,a.wp-block-button__link:not(.has-background):active,a.wp-block-button__link:not(.has-background):focus,a.wp-block-button__link:not(.has-background):hover{color:#ffffff;background-color:#3f3f3f;}
.generate-back-to-top,.generate-back-to-top:visited{background-color:rgba( 0,0,0,0.4 );color:#ffffff;}
.generate-back-to-top:hover,.generate-back-to-top:focus{background-color:rgba( 0,0,0,0.6 );color:#ffffff;}
.entry-content .alignwide, body:not(.no-sidebar) .entry-content .alignfull{margin-left:-40px;width:calc(100% + 80px);max-width:calc(100% + 80px);}
@media (max-width:768px){.separate-containers .inside-article, .separate-containers .comments-area, .separate-containers .page-header, .separate-containers .paging-navigation, .one-container .site-content, .inside-page-header{padding:30px;}
.entry-content .alignwide, body:not(.no-sidebar) .entry-content .alignfull{margin-left:-30px;width:calc(100% + 60px);max-width:calc(100% + 60px);}}.rtl .menu-item-has-children .dropdown-menu-toggle{padding-left:20px;}
.rtl .main-navigation .main-nav ul li.menu-item-has-children > a{padding-right:20px;}
.one-container .sidebar .widget{padding:0px;}
.page .entry-content{margin-top:0px;}
.entry-content > .alignwide:first-child, .entry-content > .alignfull:first-child{margin-top:-40px;}
.generate-content-header{background-position:center center;}</style>

id="pl-38" class="panel-layout"><div id="pg-38-0" class="panel-grid panel-no-style"><div id="pgc-38-0-0" class="panel-grid-cell"><div id="panel-38-0-0-0" class="so-panel widget widget_sow-editor panel-first-child panel-last-child" data-index="0"><div class="so-widget-sow-editor so-widget-sow-editor-base"><h3 class="widget-title">Welcome</h3> <div class="siteorigin-widget-tinymce textwidget"> <div id="item5" class="style12"> <h2>This website is here to help you find out more about your Town Council</h2> <p>If there is something you can't find, <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/contact/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">get in touch</a> and we'll be happy to help.</p> <p>Click on the following titles to find details about about Town Council <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/meetings.php">Committee Meetings</a>, <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/meetings/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Committee Structure</a>, <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ak6jookluba7d1n/AADzUCdAv91wmqdyweq5U-noa/Terms%20of%20Reference%2005.05.15%20current.doc?dl=0">Terms of Reference</a>, <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/s/lfgdp0bhotb7jyr/STANDING%20ORDERS%20Public%20FINAL%20V1.0%20for%20Full%20Council%2020%2006%2017.pdf?dl=0" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Standing Orders</a>, <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t2312s0793z1s5v/AACpTz0zrBR8-uicfbsGUjDBa?dl=0" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Financial Regulations</a>, <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/sh/z4o9catnoq6mytx/AACaUhalfcJU7PCQoSetgjDaa?dl=0">Financial documents</a>, <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/projects.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Neighbourhood Plan</a> and <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/home/Website%20Documents/04%20Grant%20Documents" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Grants policy and application forms</a>.</p> <p>The Town Council Business Plan is available to view <a href="https://www.dropbox.com/s/mpupf29rbm9h4il/Business%20Plan.pdf?dl=0" target="_blank" rel="noopener">here</a>.</p> <h3>Want to report something?</h3> <p>To report an issue to Wiltshire Council, visit their website <a href="http://www.wiltshire.gov.uk/mywiltshire-online-reporting" target="_blank" rel="noopener">HERE</a> or you can also download their reporting App <a href="http://www.wiltshire.gov.uk/mywiltshire-download" target="_blank" rel="noopener">HERE</a></p> <p>Please note: It is often helpful if you are able to provide precise locations and/or photo evidence when reporting issues.</p> <p>For general enquiries or if you would like to get in touch, please email <a href="mailto:office@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk">office@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk</a> or call 01225 864240</p> <p><a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/event/annual-pancake-race/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><img class="alignleft size-full wp-image-5804" src="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Pancake-race-FB-banner.jpg" alt="" width="820" height="312" srcset="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Pancake-race-FB-banner.jpg 820w, https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Pancake-race-FB-banner-300x114.jpg 300w, https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Pancake-race-FB-banner-768x292.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 820px) 100vw, 820px"/></a></p> <p> </p></div></div></div></div></div><div id="pgc-38-0-1" class="panel-grid-cell"><div id="panel-38-0-1-0" class="so-panel widget widget_sow-editor panel-first-child panel-last-child" data-index="1"><div class="so-widget-sow-editor so-widget-sow-editor-base"><h3 class="widget-title">Latest News</h3> <div class="siteorigin-widget-tinymce textwidget"> <p>Our <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/news/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">News page</a> is updated regularly with information about Councillor activities, Council affiliated/sponsored events, road closure notices and stories about the town in general. You can visit the page by clicking <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/news/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">HERE.</a></p> <p>We are very active on social media as @BoATownCouncil, so like/follow us on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/BoATownCouncil/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Facebook</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/BoATownCouncil" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Twitter</a> to get notifications of news stories and lots more! We're also on <a href="https://www.instagram.com/boatowncouncil/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Instagram</a> where we invite you to tag photos of the town #bradfordonavon</p> <p><a href="http://bradfordonavontowncouncil.us8.list-manage2.com/subscribe?u=8935e99830e5dd504e03bd775&id=2150ce246a&utm_content=buffere07c2&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer">Sign Up Here</a> to receive our e-newsletters.</p> <h4><b>Want to tell us about an event?</b></h4> <p>If you are holding a community event within Bradford on Avon, we may be able to help promote it on our town noticeboards (space permitting) and also on our Tourist Information website <a href="http://www.bradfordonavon.co.uk" target="_blank" rel="noopener">www.bradfordonavon.co.uk</a> We also have a good following on social media and our News Feed, so if you have something coming up send a press pack, (including event poster in JPEG format, story and any high res photos) to: <a href="mailto:events@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk" target="_blank" rel="noopener">events@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk</a></p> <p>Events and clubs hiring our facilities at St Margaret's Hall, the Youth & Community Centre, Westbury Garden or Victory Field can also be added to this website's <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/whats-on/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">What's On page</a>. To find out more about our venues and facilities <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/venues-to-hire/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">CLICK HERE</a> or email: <a href="mailto:hallmanager@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk" target="_blank" rel="noopener">hallmanager@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk</a></p> <h4>If you have any queries regarding the contents of this website or other @BoATownCouncil (Facebook, Twitter or Instagram) online platforms please contact our Communications Manager: <a href="mailto:lydia@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk" target="_blank" rel="noopener">lydia@bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk</a></h4> <h4>Still can't find what you're looking for? <a href="https://bradfordonavontowncouncil.gov.uk/contact/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Get in touch</a></h4> <p> </p> <p> </p></div></div></div></div></div><div id="pg-38-1" class="panel-grid panel-no-style"><div id="pgc-38-1-0" class="panel-grid-cell"><div id="panel-38-1-0-0" class="so-panel widget widget_sow-editor panel-first-child panel-last-child" data-index="2"><div class="panel-widget-style panel-widget-style-for-38-1-0-0"><div class="so-widget-sow-editor so-widget-sow-editor-base"><h3 class="widget-title">Forthcoming Meetings</h3>
